parameters.name: RotAxisIndex
parameters.description: Rotation manipulator index as defined in swRotationAxisIndex_e

title: IExplodeStep.GetRotationAxis
description: Gets the rotation axis (manipulator index and entity) for this regular explode step.

parameters.name: RotAxisIndex
parameters.description: Rotation manipulator index as defined in swRotationAxisIndex_e

returns: Rotation axis entity; Nothing or null if a rotation axis entity was not selected during creation of this explode step
remarks: This method is not valid for subassembly explode steps.
